      • initializeWeights

        public void initializeWeights(ImageContainer query,
                     DescriptorType type)
        Initializes weights for the merged descriptor in order to weight each individual descriptor instead of each individual feature. FeatureWeight = 1/(DescriptorAmount*CurrentDescriptorLength)
        Parameters:
        query - the query image
        type - The descriptor type used.
